entry.string: Helpdesk is system which enables system admin support to its users though a web based interface. It allows admin to track the progress of tickets.
entry.translation: Helpdesk is system vheech inebles system edmeen sooppurt tu its users thuoogh a veb besed interffece-a. It elloos edmeen tu treck zee prugress ooff teeckets. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: From the menu, you have three choices. "Overview", "View Items", and "Modify Configuration".
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a three-a chueeces. "Oferfeeoo", "Feeoo Items", und "Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun".

entry.string: Overview -- Allows you to view this screen.
entry.translation: Oferfeeoo -- Elloos yuoo tu feeoo thees screee.

entry.string: View Items -- Allows you to manage any helpdesk item.
entry.translation: Feeoo Items -- Elloos yuoo tu munege-a uny helpdesk item.

entry.string: Modify Configuration -- Allows you to set certain configuration routines for forums.
entry.translation: Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun -- Elloos yuoo tu set certeeen cunffeegooreshun ruooteenes fur furooms.
